content: have fun making this little dino in bright or pastel colours getting an exact gauge is not important for this project product information * this item is a pdf that you download through ravelry * the pattern is written in **uk terminology** * the finished product ends up approximately 7 5cm tall using similar yarn and hook size thinner yarn and a smaller hook size will produce a smaller product and vice versa * gauge is not important - just make sure the stitches are tight enough so that the stuffing doesn t show through skills * suitable for beginners / intermediate * magic_ring double_crochet increase invisible decrease crocheting around a chain continuous rounds materials * 8 ply dk cotton in green and blue * black embroidery thread to embroider mouth * pink embroidery thread to embroider cheeks * 3mm crochet hook * yarn needle * polyester fibrefill stuffing * 8mm safety eyes please tag me on instagram @handmade__byani as i would love to see your creations if you have any questions feel free to contact me happy crocheting anika *** disclaimer *** please do not redistribute sell or claim this pattern whole or in part as your own you may sell finished items handmade by you in limited quantities from this pattern using your own photos if you do please credit handmade by ani anika kam as the designer
